clinical_study.brief_title: Amlodipine Plus/Minus Atorvastatin for Protection of Arteries
clinical_study.official_title: Amlodipine Plus/Minus Atorvastatin for Protection of Arteries

brief_summary.textblock: The primary objective of this study is to test the hypothesis that amlodipine plus atorvastatin given in a single tablet (Caduet), compared with amlodipine alone (Norvasc), has a stronger effect in protection of arterial structure and function.
